embed: <object width="640" height="390"><param name="movie" value="http://youtube.com/v/uFRJsbV8W_4?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://youtube.com/v/uFRJsbV8W_4?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="390" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
In this talk, aimed at novice Python and Django developers, we'll have a look
at getting started with testing your Django applications, how to properly
write your first test case and then moving to automated testing with Travis
CI.
title: Testing Django with Travis CI
